med001.name: Amoxicillin
med001.dosage: Adult - 500 mg every 12 hours or 250 mg every 8 hours Child - 40 mg per kilogram (kg) of weight per day in divided doses every 8 hours
med001.sieff: Upset stomach, Diarrhea, Vomiting, Yeast infection
med001.uses: Amoxicillin is used to treat different types of infection caused by bacteria, such as tonsillitis, bronchitis, pneumonia, gonorrhea, and infections of the ear, nose, throat, skin, or urinary tract.

med002.name: Acetaminophen
med002.dosage: Child - 48-59 lbs Adult - 160 mg ; 80 mg/0.8 mL ; 160 mg/5 mL
med002.sieff: Bloody or black tarry stools ,bloody or cloudy urine, yellow eyes or skin
med002.checom: Povidone, Pregelatinized Starch, Sodium Starch Glycolate, Stearic Acid
med002.uses: Drug is used to treat mild to moderate pain (from headaches, menstrual periods, toothaches, backaches, osteoarthritis,or cold/flu aches and pains) and to reduce fever.

med003.name: Bactrim
med003.dosage: Adult - 2 bactrim tablets every 12 hours for 10 to 14 days Child - ½ bactrim tablets every 12 hours for 5 days
med003.sieff: changes in skin color, chest pain, chills, cough or hoarseness, dark urine, diarrhea, dizziness
med003.checom: trimethoprim IP 160 mg, Sulphamethoxazole IP 800 mg
med003.uses: To treat a variety of bacterial infections (such as middle ear, urine, respiratory, and intestinal infections)

med004.name: citalopram
med004.dosage: Adult - 20 mg orally once a day Child - 10 mg/5 mL once a day
med004.sieff: Agitation, blurred vision, confusion, fever, lack of emotion, loss of memory
med004.checom: copolyvidone, corn starch, crosscarmellose sodium, glycerin, lactose monohydrate, magnesium stearate, hypromellose, microcrystalline cellulose, polyethylene glycol, titanium dioxide and iron dioxide for coloring
med004.uses: Citalopram is used to treat depression.

med005.name: Ditropan XL
med005.dosage: Adult- 5-mg tablet two to three times a day
med005.sieff: Clumsiness or unsteadiness, confusion, convulsions, dizziness, drowsiness (severe), fainting, fast, slow, or irregular heartbeat, fever
med005.checom: butylated hydroxytoluene, cellulose acetate, hypromellose, lactose, magnesium stearate, polyethylene glycol, polyethylene oxide, polysorbate 80, propylene glycol, synthetic iron oxides and titanium dioxide.
med005.uses: Ditropan XL is used to treat symptoms of overactive bladder, such as frequent or urgent urination, incontinence (urine leakage), and increased night-time urination.

med006.name: Elavil
med006.sieff: Abdominal pain, agitation, black tarry stools, bleeding gums, blood in urine or stools, blurred vision
med006.checom: colloidal silicon dioxide, hypromellose, lactose monohydrate, magnesium stearate, microcrystalline cellulose, polyethylene glycol, polysorbate, sodium starch glycolate and titanium dioxide
med006.uses: Elavil is used to treat symptoms of depression.

med007.name: Forteo
med007.sieff: leg cramps, joint pain, sore throat, runny nose, headache, neck pain, nausea, constipation, diarrhea
med007.checom: glacial acetic acid, sodium acetate (anhydrous), mannitol, metacresol
med007.uses: Forteo is used to treat osteoporosis in men and women who have a high risk of bone fracture.

med008.name: Glucotrol
med008.sieff: chills, cold sweats, coma, confusion, pale skin, depression, difficulty with moving, dizziness, fainting
med008.checom: colloidal silicon dioxide; lactose; microcrystalline cellulose; starch; stearic acid
med008.uses: helps to control blood sugar levels by helping your pancreas produce insulin.

med009.name: Humulin
med009.dosage: Dosage is based on the individual's metabolic needs, blood glucose results and glycemic control goal
med009.sieff: insulin allergy, trouble breathing, wheezing, rapid pulse, sweating
med009.uses: Humulin is used to improve blood sugar control in adults

med010.name: Imodium
med010.dosage: Adult - 4mg (two capsules) followed by 2 mg (one capsule) after each unformed stool Child - liquid formulation (IMODIUM® A-D 1 mg/7.5 mL) should be used
med010.sieff: Bloating, constipation, loss of appetite, stomach pain (severe) with nausea and vomiting
med010.checom: Lactose, cornstarch, talc, and magnesium stearate
med010.uses: Imodium is used to treat diarrhea

med011.name: Januvia
med011.dosage: The recommended dose of JANUVIA is 100 mg once daily. JANUVIA can be taken with or without food.
med011.sieff: Anxiety blurred vision, chills, cold sweats, confusion, cool, pale skin, depression, dizziness, fast heartbeat, headache
med011.checom: microcrystalline cellulose, anhydrous dibasic calcium phosphate, croscarmellose sodium

med012.name: melmet
med012.sieff: Flatulence, Muscle pain, Abdominal bloating, Chest pain, Skin rash, Flushing, Abdominal pain, Nail disorder, Diarrhoea, Headache, Indigestion, Bitter taste, Constipation, Allergic reaction, Heartburn
med012.uses: Melmet 500 mg tablet sr is used in the treatment of Type 2 diabetes, Polycystic ovary syndrome

med013.name: dolo
med013.dosage: 500 - 1000 mg in 3 times daily Maximum dose: 4 g / day
med013.sieff: Skin reddening,Shortness of breath,Feeling of sickness,Allergic reactions,Swollen facial features,Liver damage
med013.uses: Dolo Tablet is a medicine that is used for the treatment of Cold, Fever, Joint pain, Headache, Toothache, Ear pain and other conditions.

med014.name: Forminal G
med014.dosage: Initially one 500 mg tablet three times a day, with or after food. After 10 to 15 days the dose should be adjusted, or increased to 850 mg or 1000 mg twice daily
med014.sieff: Megaloblastic anaemia, Ketoacidosis and ketonuria, Severe cholestatic hepatsitis, Hypersensitivity, Hypoglycaemia, Anorexia, nausea, vomiting, constipation, diarrhoea
med014.uses: Forminal G Tablet is a medicine that is used for the treatment of Type 2 diabetes mellitus, Maturity onset diabetes, Polycystic ovary syndrome and other conditions.

med015.name: Gelusil Antacid And Anti-Gas
med015.dosage: Tablets: Chew 1-2 to tablets half to one hour after meals or as required. Repeat hourly if symptoms return, or as directed by a physician. Liquid: Shake well before use. Take 1-2 teaspoonful (Approx. 5-10 ml) half to one hour after meals or as required.
med015.sieff: This medication can cause nausea, constipation, diarrhea, or headache
med015.checom: Dimethicone l.P. 50 mg, Magnesium Hydroxide I.P 250 mg, Dried Aluminium Hydrioxide 250 mg, Magnesium Aluminium Silicate Hydrate 50 mg
med015.uses: This medication is used to treat the symptoms of too much stomach acid such as stomach upset, heartburn, and acid indigestion

med016.name: concor
med016.dosage: 5 mg should be taken once a day in the morning, either on an empty stomach or with breakfast. If necessary, the dosage can be increased to 10 mg in the morning. An increase in the dosage to 20 mg daily may sometimes be necessary.
med016.sieff: These include lassitude, dizziness, mild headache, perspiration, bradycardia, sleep disorders, restlessness, cold extremities, nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea and skin rash. Constipation, hypotension, paradoxical hypertension, depression, mass gain, paraesthesia, transient hearing loss, heart block, hallucinations, disturbances of vision, blood disorders, fluid retention, muscle cramps, allergic reactions, metabolic disturbances, alopecia, myopathies and stomatitis may occur. Overt psychosis has been reported with other beta-blockers.
med016.checom: Each tablet contains 5 mg or 10 mg bisoprolol fumarate (2:1).
med016.uses: It is mainly used to treat cardiovascular illnesses such as high blood pressure (high blood pressure), coronary heart illness, arrhythmias (irregular heartbeat), ischemic heart illness (restricted blood supply to the heart), and myocardial infarction (necrosis of the heart muscle leading to heart attack).

med017.name: nasonex
med017.dosage: Adults - 2 sprays(50 mcg of mometasone furoate in each spray)in each nostril once daily (total daily dose of 200 mcg) Child - 1 spray(50 mcg of mometasone furoate in each spray)in each nostril once daily (total daily dose of 100 mcg)
med017.sieff: Bloody mucus or unexplained nosebleeds, chills, cold or flu-like symptoms, cough or hoarseness, fever, headache, increased abdominal or stomach pain and cramping during menstrual periods, muscle or bone pain, stuffy or runny nose
med017.checom: NASONEX Nasal Spray 50 mcg is a metered-dose, manual pump spray unit containing an aqueous suspension of mometasone furoate monohydrate equivalent to 0.05% w/w mometasone furoate calculated on the anhydrous basis
med017.uses: Nasonex (mometasone) is used to treat nasal symptoms of seasonal or year-round allergies, including congestion, sneezing, and runny nose.

med018.name: paroxetine
med018.sieff: Agitation, chest congestion, chest pain, chills, cold sweats, confusion, difficulty with breathing, dizziness, faintness
med018.checom: dibasic calcium phosphate dihydrate, hypromellose, magnesium stearate, polyethylene glycols, polysorbate 80, sodium starch glycolate, titanium dioxide
med018.uses: Paroxetine is used to treat depression, obsessive-compulsive disorder, anxiety disorders, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), and premenstrual dysphoric disorder (PMDD).
